key_features: Earn 10X TREATS Points (equivalent to 4 air miles) at selected retail, dining merchants and petrol stations
Complimentary enrolment into Rewards Infinite Programme, where your TREATS Points never expire
Conversion fee waived for each conversion of points to frequent flyer miles
Up to 19.1% exclusive savings on petrol
Complimentary green fees all year round at 100 participating golf clubs in 19 countries
Complimentary Plaza Premium airport lounge access
Redeem selected gift items at half the usual TREATS Points on your birthday month.
petrol: Earn 10X TREATS Points (equivalent to 4 air miles) at selected petrol stations
Up to 20.05% exclusive savings on petrol with the Diamond Sky Fuel Card
rewards: Earn 10X TREATS Points (equivalent to 4 air miles) at selected retail merchants
Earn 1X Rewards for every S$1 spent on all other retail purchases
Complimentary enrolment into Rewards Infinite Programme, where your TREATS Points never expire
Redeem selected gift items at half the usual TREATS Points on your birthday month.
dining: Earn 10X TREATS Points (equivalent to 4 air miles) at selected dining merchants
shopping: Earn 10X TREATS Points (equivalent to 4 air miles) at selected retail merchants

fees.annual_fee_waiver: Waiver for first Year. Subsequent annual fee will be automatically waived with a total minimum spend of S$24,000 per annum
fees.annual_interest_rate: 27.90% p.a. subject to a minimum charge of S$3.00
fees.late_payment_fee: 5% of the minimum monthly repayment or S$100, whichever is higher, if minimum monthly repayment is not received by due date
fees.minimum_monthly_repayment: 3% of outstanding balance or S$20, whichever is higher
fees.foreign_transaction_fee: All transactions in foreign currency will be subject to an administrative fee of 2.25% and a currency conversion charge of 1% imposed by the respective card associations
fees.cash_advance_fee: 8% of the transaction amount or S$15, whichever is higher
